desc: Well before Ajax and Microsoft’s Windows Presentation Foundation hit the scene, Macromedia offered the first method for building web pages with the responsiveness and functionality of desktop programs with its Flash-based “Rich Internet Applications”. Now, new owner Adobe is taking Flash and its powerful capabilities beyond the Web and making it a full-fledged development environment.

details.authors: Joey Lott, Darron Schall, Keith Peters

title: ActionScript 3.0 Cookbook: Solutions for Flash Platform and Flex Application Developers
